pageContext.claim: “I mean, the governor of Washington was saying that he can't find cotton because -- you know, a swab is a very easy thing to get. And swab is -- essentially, it's a little bit more sophisticated than a Q-tip. And you got to be able to go out and find. You know, the federal government shouldn't be forced to go and do everything.”
pageContext.analysis: It took months for the U.S. to expand swab productions, which led to a shortage as testing ramped up.
